name: Gather Community Plant #019 - Sleepy Ghost
description:
The Gather Community Plant Collection features works from Tezos artists and their rendition of the GatherArt plant. The plant signifies beginnings, growth, eco friendliness, and the concept of nurturing what we love.

SleepyGhost is a pixel artist and musician from Los Angeles who loves the 8bit aesthetic and making people feel nostalgia from their experimental creations.

"I’ve loved the look of “pixel art” before I even knew that term, since a ton of games I played as a kid were made with pixel art. My most fond games of that era were probably Zelda: Link’s Awakening and Pokemon Silver. I remember wanting to be a game developer as a kid (and an NBA player), and make grand RPGs like those, but those plans got derailed for other interests later in my life." - SleepyGhost
